name: Heaven Saga
description:
Join Sonic the Hedgehog and his heavenly adventures as he dashes through the Gates of Heaven! Lailah (The Angel of Heaven) invited Sonic to come up to Heaven to rest for a while. But as demons got mad because of Sonic's recent victory after surviving in the dark realm, they decided to get their revenge against Sonic! Will Sonic survive? Will the demons be able to get their revenge? Let's find out!

Heaven Saga is an official non-profit Sonic fan game created and developed by the Ages Team. It is associated with the Christianity religion and it is based on the world’s best 16-bit SEGA Genesis console.

After defeating a bunch of demons of hell, our poor, blue beloved famous hero, Sonic the Hedgehog, has become exhausted from all of that fighting with demons. Sonic decided to take a break for a while. The Angel of Heaven offered Sonic to enter Heaven to rest in peace. But when the demons got mad due to Sonic’s recent victory in the dark realm, they wanted revenge against Sonic. So, the battle isn't over, yet! Help Sonic survive as he dashes through the Gates of Heaven and other dimensions into a dangerous journey to save earthling life forms and spiritual souls from demons' maniacal demands that could ruin the entire universe.

This is a protesting project due to so many hellish games on the internet that talk or support hell. This project is associated with the Christianity religion and the purpose of this was to encourage people to remember and to keep in touch with God and the beauty of Christianity. 😊😌✝️

However, if you have problems with religions like this, then you should NOT play this game. 

⍟ MAJOR UPGRADE⍟

Version 1.0.0.0

~

  • ⍟ A brand NEW platformer engine has finally been implemented, with actual slopes and accurate Genesis Physics! ⍟
  • Expanded levels!
  • All levels has been polished with texture!
  • All levels has been expanded! You now must run right and find the exit! Portals has been removed.
  • Brand new cutscene dialoges.
  • New and incredible music has been added!
  • Level backgrounds, like trees and fences, has been added to every level!
  • New background effects, such as sparkles floating on Peaceful Glance Zone.
  • All bosses have been optimized, with new features, and animations!
  • All-new button menus has been added!
  • All titles and buttons has been retextured!
  • A new feature, “My eSite“, has been added on the options menu, specifically for Agesite members!
